name: @vita/circuits
description: ZK-SNARK circuits for VITA Protocol - Proof of Work verification

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/proof_of_work.r1cs pot16_final.ptau build/proof_of_work.zkey
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/proof_of_work.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/proof_of_work.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.full-setup: pnpm compile && pnpm setup && pnpm export-vkey && pnpm export-verifier
